module top_module (
	input do_sub,
	input [7:0] a,
	input [7:0] b,
	output reg [7:0] out,
	output reg result_is_zero
);

canonical_solution:
assign f = ( ~x3 & x2 & ~x1 ) | 
				( ~x3 & x2 & x1 ) |
				( x3 & ~x2 & x1 ) |
				( x3 & x2 & x1 ) ;
	
endmodule

prompt:
module top_module (
	input a, 
	input b,
	input c,
	input d,
	output out
);
canonical_solution:
assign out = (~c & ~b) | (~d&~a) | (a&c&d) | (b&c&d);
	
endmodule

prompt:
module top_module(
	input clk,
	input load,
	input [511:0] data,
	output reg [511:0] q);
canonical_solution:
always @(posedge clk) begin
		if (load)
			q <= data;
		else begin
			q <= 
			~((q[$bits(q)-1:1] & q[$bits(q)-1:0] & {q[$bits(q)-2:0], 1'b0}) |
			(~q[$bits(q)-1:1] & ~q[$bits(q)-1:0] & ~{q[$bits(q)-2:0], 1'b0}) |  
			(q[$bits(q)-1:1] & ~q[$bits(q)-1:0] & ~{q[$bits(q)-2:0], 1'b0}) )
			;
		end
	end
endmodule

assign {out_hi, out_lo} = in;
	
endmodule
